File /std/room/inherit/honours.c

This room keeps track of the people who have been given the specified honoury title and why. It also makes sure that anyone who logs on with the title is allowed to have it.

Don't forget to add the room to the title handler as controlling this title.

Written by Pinkfish

Started Wed Oct 17 13:15:03 PDT 2001

This class includes the following files /include/player_handler.h, /include/player.h and /include/playtesters.h
